description: Don’t like rigid posts between your toes? Give these supportive sandals with soft toe loops a try. Whether you pair them with a thick wool sweater and jeans or something dressier, they deliver the same flexible shock-absorbing base. Arch support and a deep heel cup cradle you through every step, because feeling good at sunset dance parties never goes out of style.Smooth and durable synthetic Birko-Flor leather uppers.2 adjustable straps with buckles.Soft anatomically shaped cork latex core between jute layers for stability and moisture management.Suede leather lining provides a nice climate for your feet.Footbed edge is slightly raised to protect your feet from toe-stubbing.Toe bar guides your toes into place and promotes natural steps.EVA outsole for lightweight durability and absorbing shocks.
name: Birkenstock Mayari Sandals - Women's
